pullrequest.title: First pass at gflags command line argument parsing

content.raw: It looks like I was missing generation of a CMake variable, but building it in such a way that it still worked for me :) hopefully the latest commit fixes the issue. Now I'm able to run the commands as you listed them.
content.html: It looks like I was missing generation of a CMake variable, but building it in such a way that it still worked for me :) hopefully the latest commit fixes the issue. Now I'm able to run the commands as you listed them.
